PHRASE.LANG: Jouer à Chasseur de trésors PlayStation®Home
Gioca Cacciatore di tesori di PlayStation®Home
Juega a Cazador de Tesoros de PlayStation®Home

Pre-order the game today in PlayStation®Home to receive a limited edition Nathan Drake outfit with custom shooting animation for your PlayStation®Home avatar - an exclusive outfit not available anywhere else!

Pré-commander le jeu dès aujourd'hui sur le PlayStation®Home pour recevoir une tenue édition limitée de Nathan Drake avec animation tir personnalisé pour votre PlayStation®Home avatar - Tenue exclusive disponible nulle part ailleurs !

Bestelle das Spiel heute in PlayStation®Home vor und erhalte ein limitiertes "Nathan Drake"-Kostüm mit eigener Schieß-Animation für deinen PlayStation®Home-Avatar – ein exklusives Outfit, das es sonst nirgends gibt!

Pre-order the game today in PlayStation®Home to receive a limited edition Nathan Drake outfit with custom shooting animation for your PlayStation®Home avatar - an exclusive outfit not available anywhere else!

Pre-order the game today in PlayStation®Home to receive a limited edition Nathan Drake outfit with custom shooting animation for your PlayStation®Home avatar - an exclusive outfit not available anywhere else!

Cheat mode: [L1] + [SQUARE] to toggle unlock all
Cheat-Modus: Mit [L1] + [SQUARE] "alle freischalten" ein- oder ausschalten.
Modalità trucchi: [L1] + [SQUARE] per attivare e disattivare lo sbloccaggio di ogni elemento
치트 모드: [L1] + [SQUARE] 을 눌러 모두 해제로 전환
Cheat mode: [L1] + [SQUARE] to toggle unlock all
作弊模式：[L1] + [SQUARE] 切換至解除全部內容
作弊模式：[L1] + [SQUARE] 切換至解除全部內容
Cheat mode: [L1] + [SQUARE] to toggle unlock all

Cheat mode:
 [L1] + [SQUARE] to reset all challenges.
 [L1] + [TRIANGLE] to unlock all challenges.
 [L1] + [CROSS] to unlock selected challenge.

Mode triche :
 [L1] + [SQUARE] pour réinitialiser tous les défis.
 [L1] + [TRIANGLE] pour débloquer tous les défis.
 [L1] + [CROSS] pour débloquer le défi sélectionné.

Cheat-Modus:
 Mit [L1] + [SQUARE] alle Herausforderungen zurücksetzen.
 Mit [L1] + [TRIANGLE] alle Herausforderungen freischalten.
 Mit [L1] + [CROSS] ausgewählte Herausforderung freischalten.

Modalità trucchi:
 [L1] + [SQUARE] per ripristinare tutte le sfide.
 [L1] + [TRIANGLE] per sbloccare tutte le sfide.
 [L1] + [CROSS] per sbloccare la sfida selezionata.

Modo Trampas:
 [L1] + [SQUARE] para restablecer todos los desafíos.
 [L1] + [TRIANGLE] para desbloquear todos los desafíos.
 [L1] + [CROSS] para desbloquear el desafío seleccionado.

치트 모드:
 [L1] + [SQUARE] 을 눌러 모든 도전을 리셋하십시오. 
 [L1] + [TRIANGLE] 을 눌러 모든 도전을 해제하십시오.
 [L1] + [CROSS] 을 눌러 선택된 도전을 해제하십시오.

Cheat mode:
 [L1] + [SQUARE] to reset all challenges.
 [L1] + [TRIANGLE] to unlock all challenges.
 [L1] + [CROSS] to unlock selected challenge.

作弊模式：
 [L1] + [SQUARE]重設所有挑戰。
 [L1] + [TRIANGLE] 解除所有挑戰。
 [L1] + [CROSS]解除所選的挑戰。

作弊模式：
 [L1] + [SQUARE]重設所有挑戰。
 [L1] + [TRIANGLE] 解除所有挑戰。
 [L1] + [CROSS]解除所選的挑戰。

Cheat mode:
 [L1] + [SQUARE] to reset all challenges.
 [L1] + [TRIANGLE] to unlock all challenges.
 [L1] + [CROSS] to unlock selected challenge.

Think you have what it takes to run around the mean streets of Yemen? Does escaping from a posse of gun blazing enemies sound like your typical Saturday night?
Do you like “borrowing” valuable items that don’t necessarily belong to you? Does getting shot at sound like fun? Well if you answered yes to all of these questions, then you’re in luck! Play the PlayStation®Home Fortune Hunter game now and put your skills to the test!


Most people think that being a Fortune Hunter is all about the fame and the glory. Well they’re wrong, dead wrong. It takes extraordinary skill, quick wits and nerves of steel.
Be warned, the road to success won’t be an easy one, but if you can get through this test, you might just have what it takes to become the next great Fortune Hunter of PlayStation®Home.

Vous pensez en avoir assez dans le ventre pour vous balader dans les rues mal famées du Yémen ? Vous échapper d'une bande d'ennemis armés jusqu'aux dents est votre lot quotidien ?
Vous aimez "emprunter" des objets de valeur qui ne vous appartiennent pas forcément ? Pour vous, se faire tirer dessus est amusant ? Si vous avez répondu oui à toutes ses questions, vous avez de la chance ! Jouez dès maintenant au jeu PlayStation®Home, Chasseur de trésors, et mettez votre technique à l'épreuve !

La plupart des gens pensent qu'être Chasseur de trésors n'est qu'une question de gloire et de célébrité. Ils se mettent le doigt dans l'œil... jusqu'au cou. Il faut une habileté extraordinaire, des réflexes rapides et des nerfs d'acier.
Vous êtes prévenu, la route qui mène à la réussite n'est pas la plus facile, mais si vous terminez ces épreuves, vous pourriez bien devenir le prochain grand Chasseur de trésors de PlayStation®Home.

Hast du das Zeug dazu, durch die Straßen des Jemen zu laufen? Ist die Flucht vor einer Horde schießwütiger Gegner für dich die richtige Samstagabend-Beschäftigung?
"Borgst" du dir gerne wertvolle Gegenstände, die dir möglicherweise nicht gehören? Findest du es lustig, wenn auf dich geschossen wird? Wenn du all diese Fragen mit "Ja" beantwortet hast, dann hast du Glück! Spiele jetzt PlayStation®Home Schatzsucher und teste deine Fähigkeiten!


Die meisten Leute glauben, dass es im Leben eines Schatzsuchers nur um Ruhm und Ehre geht. Da liegen sie falsch, mächtig falsch. Man braucht unglaubliche Fähigkeiten, einen wachen Geist und Nerven aus Stahl.
Sei gewarnt: Es ist nicht leicht auf der Straße zum Erfolg. Doch wenn du diese Prüfung überstehst, hast du vielleicht das Zeug dazu, der nächste große Schatzsucher bei PlayStation®Home zu werden.

Credi di poter sopravvivere ai pericolosi bassifondi dello Yemen? Fuggire da una cricca di nemici armati fino ai denti è il tuo passatempo preferito?
Ti piace "prendere in prestito" oggetti preziosi non necessariamente di tua proprietà? Ti esalta l'idea di sentire i proiettili sfrecciarti accanto? Beh, se la risposta a tutte queste domande è "sì", puoi ritenerti fortunato! Prova subito Cacciatore di tesori di PlayStation®Home e metti alla prova le tue capacità!


Molti pensano che la vita di un cacciatore di tesori sia lastricata di fama e successo. Beh, si sbagliano, e di grosso. Ci vogliono doti fuori dal comune, riflessi fulminei e nervi d'acciaio.
Ricorda: la strada per il successo non sarà agevole, ma se riuscirai a superare questa prova, potresti avere la stoffa per diventare il più grande cacciatore di tesori di PlayStation®Home.

¿Tienes lo que hay que tener para sobrevivir en las calles de Yemen? ¿Escapar de un montón de enemigos armados es tu plan para el fin de semana?
¿Te gusta "tomar prestados" objetos de valor que no te pertenecen? ¿Te divierte que te disparen? Si has respondido sí a todas estas preguntas, ¡estás de suerte! ¡Juega a Cazador de tesoros en PlayStation®Home y pon a prueba tus habilidades!


La mayoría de la gente cree que la vida de los cazadores de tesoros solo gira en torno a la fama y la gloria. Pues se equivocan, mortalmente. Hacen falta habilidades extraordinarias, una mente ágil y nervios de acero.
Ojo, el camino al éxito no será fácil. Con todo, si superas esta prueba, tal vez tengas lo que hay que tener para convertirte en el próximo gran cazador de tesoros de PlayStation®Home.

예멘의 악명 높은 거리에서 살아 남을 수 있습니까? 총을 난사하는 갱단으로부터 도망치는 것이 당신의 일상적인 토요일 오후인가요?
당신의 소유가 아닌 귀중품을 잠시 빌리는 것을 좋아하십니까? 총알을 피하는 것을 즐기시나요? 모든 질문에 "네"라고 답하셨다면 당신은 행운아입니다! PlayStation®Home 보물 사냥꾼 게임을 플레이하시고 실력을 점검해 보세요!


보물 사냥꾼이 되는 것은 오직 영광과 유명세 뿐이라고 많은 사람들이 착각하지만, 그것은 아주 큰 오해입니다. 엄청난 실력과 배짱이 있어야만 하죠!
성공의 길은 멀고 험합니다. 하지만 이 시험에 합격해 낸다면, 어쩌면 당신도 PlayStation®Home의 보물 사냥꾼이 될 수 있을지 모릅니다.

Think you have what it takes to run around the mean streets of Yemen? Does escaping from a posse of gun blazing enemies sound like your typical Saturday night?
Do you like “borrowing” valuable items that don’t necessarily belong to you? Does getting shot at sound like fun? Well if you answered yes to all of these questions, then you’re in luck! Play the PlayStation®Home Fortune Hunter game now and put your skills to the test!


Most people think that being a Fortune Hunter is all about the fame and the glory. Well they’re wrong, dead wrong. It takes extraordinary skill, quick wits and nerves of steel.
Be warned, the road to success won’t be an easy one, but if you can get through this test, you might just have what it takes to become the next great Fortune Hunter of PlayStation®Home.

你是否擁有過人膽色，可以穿梭葉門的大街小巷？你的週六晚上是否經常在敵人的槍林彈雨中殺出重圍？
你是不是習慣「借用」不屬於你的物件？你是否認為中槍是件樂事？如果你回答「是」，那麼你真的非常幸運！立刻遊玩「PlayStation®Home寶藏獵人」，考驗你的實力！


大部份人只為追求名利而成為寶藏獵人，他們真是…大錯特錯。事實上，成為寶藏獵人需要精湛的技術、靈活的反應和堅定的意志。
當心！成名之路來得不易。不過，如果你成功完成挑戰，就會成為新一代的PlayStation®Home寶藏獵人。

你是否擁有過人膽色，可以穿梭葉門的大街小巷？你的週六晚上是否經常在敵人的槍林彈雨中殺出重圍？
你是不是習慣「借用」不屬於你的物件？你是否認為中槍是件樂事？如果你回答「是」，那麼你真的非常幸運！立刻遊玩「PlayStation®Home寶藏獵人」，考驗你的實力！


大部份人只為追求名利而成為寶藏獵人，他們真是…大錯特錯。事實上，成為寶藏獵人需要精湛的技術、靈活的反應和堅定的意志。
當心！成名之路來得不易。不過，如果你成功完成挑戰，就會成為新一代的PlayStation®Home寶藏獵人。

Think you have what it takes to run around the mean streets of Yemen? Does escaping from a posse of gun blazing enemies sound like your typical Saturday night?
Do you like “borrowing” valuable items that don’t necessarily belong to you? Does getting shot at sound like fun? Well if you answered yes to all of these questions, then you’re in luck! Play the PlayStation®Home Fortune Hunter game now and put your skills to the test!


Most people think that being a Fortune Hunter is all about the fame and the glory. Well they’re wrong, dead wrong. It takes extraordinary skill, quick wits and nerves of steel.
Be warned, the road to success won’t be an easy one, but if you can get through this test, you might just have what it takes to become the next great Fortune Hunter of PlayStation®Home.

Community Score

On top of the 10 challenges listed in the Main Menu, there will also be a PlayStation®Home Community challenge that will be revealed at a later date.

This challenge will revolve around the amount of Community kills tracked on the Leaderboard so keep an eye out for more information from Message of the Day and the PS Blog.

Completing this challenge will get you an awesome PlayStation®Home Fortune Hunter Furniture Item!

Score de la communauté

En plus des 10 défis listés dans le menu principal, il y aura également un défi de la communauté PlayStation®Home qui sera révélé à une date ultérieure.

Ce défi sera axé sur le nombre de tués de la communauté enregistré dans les classements. Gardez un œil sur les informations du message du jour et du PlayStation blog.

En terminant ce défi, vous obtiendrez un fantastique meuble de Chasseur de trésors PlayStation®Home !

Community-Punkte

Zusätzlich zu den 10 Herausforderungen, welche im Hauptmenü aufgelistet sind, wird es eine PlayStation@Home-Community-Herausforderung geben, die zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt offenbart wird.

Diese Herausforderung wird sich um die Anzahl der Community-Eliminierungen, welche auf der Bestenliste festgehalten werden, drehen. Halte also Ausschau nach mehr Informationen in der Nachricht des Tages und dem PS Blog.

Der Abschluss dieser Herausforderung wird dich mit einem atemberaubenden PlayStation@Home-Schatzsucher-Möbelstück belohnen.

Punteggio comunitá

Oltre alle 10 sfide elencate nel Menu Principale, una sfida comunitá di PlayStation®Home sará rivelata in data futura.

Questa sfida si baserà sul numero di uccisioni comunitá regitrate nella Classifica Leader, perció tieni gli occhi aperti per maggiori informazioni in Messaggio del Giorno e Blog PS.

Completando questa sfida riceverai un fantastico Mobile Cacciatore di tesori di PlayStation®Home!

Puntuación de la comunidad

Además de los 10 desafíos que aparecen en el Menú principal, habrá un desafío de la Comunidad de PlayStation®Home que se hará público más adelante. 

Este desafío estará relacionado con el número de enemigos eliminados por la Comunidad que se hayan registrado en la Clasificación. Así que presta atención a la información nueva que aparezca en el Mensaje del día y el Blog de PS. 

 Al completar este desafío, obtendrás un nuevo objeto de mobiliario de Cazador de Tesoros de PlayStation®Home.

커뮤니티 점수

메인 메뉴에 표시된 10개의 도전 이외에도, 향후 공개되는 PlayStation®Home 커뮤니티 도전이 존재합니다.

이 도전은 리더보드에 표시되는 커뮤니티 플레이어들의 적 사살 수에 기반을 두고 있으며, 자세한 내용이 공지되기를 기다리십시오.

커뮤니티 도전을 완료하면 멋진 PlayStation®Home 보물 사냥꾼 가구 리워드를 얻을 수 있습니다!

Community Score

On top of the 10 challenges listed in the Main Menu, there will also be a PlayStation®Home Community challenge that will be revealed at a later date.

This challenge will revolve around the amount of Community kills tracked on the Leaderboard so keep an eye out for more information.

Completing this challenge will get you an awesome PlayStation®Home Fortune Hunter Furniture Item!

社群積分

在主選單中的10項挑戰清單上方，日後將會出現一個提供給PlayStation®Home社群的挑戰。

這個挑戰將會在排行榜上顯示所有的社群殺敵數，所以請密切注意。

完成挑戰您將會得到很棒的PlayStation®Home寶藏獵人的家具道具！

社群積分

在主選單中的10項挑戰清單上方，日後將會出現一個提供給PlayStation®Home社群的挑戰。

這個挑戰將會在排行榜上顯示所有的社群殺敵數，所以請密切注意。

完成挑戰您將會得到很棒的PlayStation®Home寶藏獵人的家具道具！

Community Score

On top of the 10 challenges listed in the Main Menu, there will also be a PlayStation®Home Community challenge that will be revealed at a later date.

This challenge will revolve around the amount of Community kills tracked on the Leaderboard so keep an eye out for more information from Message of the Day and the PS Blog.

Completing this challenge will get you an awesome PlayStation®Home Fortune Hunter Furniture Item!

Objective
Fight through 3 waves of enemies while collecting weapon and treasure pick-ups. At the end of each wave, a boss character must be defeated in order to move onto the next wave.

Movement
To move between cover points, press the PlayStation®3 wireless controller button that is indicated on-screen. Cover points that are not in your field of view have an arrow pointing towards their location.
Use [LEFTSTICK] to move around while on a cover point.

Objectif
Combattre 3 vagues d'ennemis tout en ramassant des armes et des trésors. À la fin de chaque vague, vous devrez battre un boss afin de passer à la vague suivante.

Déplacements
Pour vous déplacer entre les endroits à couvert, appuyez sur la touche indiquée à l'écran. Les endroits à couvert qui ne sont pas dans votre champ de vision sont indiqués par une flèche.
Utilisez [LEFTSTICK] pour vous déplacer quand vous êtes à couvert.

Ziel
Behaupte dich gegen drei feindliche Angriffswellen, während du Waffen und Schatz-Pickups einsammelst. Am Ende jeder Welle musst du einen Endgegner besiegen, um zur nächsten Welle zu gelangen.

Bewegen
Um dich zwischen Deckungen zu bewegen, drückst du die Wireless-Controller-Taste, die auf dem Bildschirm angezeigt wird. Deckungen, die sich nicht in deinem Sichtfeld befinden, werden durch einen Pfeil angezeigt, der in ihre Richtung weist.
Mit [LEFTSTICK] kannst du dich innerhalb einer Deckung bewegen.

Obiettivo
Sopravvivi a tre ondate di nemici raccogliendo armi e tesori. Al termine di ciascuna ondata, dovrai sconfiggere un boss per poter accedere alla successiva.

Movimento
Per spostarti tra i ripari, premi il tasto del controller wireless indicato su schermo. La posizione dei ripari che non rientrano nel tuo campo visivo è segnalata da una freccia.
Usa [LEFTSTICK] per spostarti mentre sei al riparo.

Objetivo
Enfréntate a tres oleadas de enemigos mientras recoges armas y tesoros. Al final de cada oleada, deberás derrotar a un jefe de nivel para pasar a la siguiente oleada.

Movimiento
Para cambiar de punto de cobertura, pulsa el botón de dirección que se muestra en la pantalla. La dirección de los puntos que no aparezcan en tu campo de visión se representará con una flecha.
Usa [LEFTSTICK] para moverte en el punto de cobertura.

목표
무기와 보물을 획득하면서, 세 차례에 걸친 적의 공격을 막아 내십시오. 각 웨이브 끝에서는 보스를 물리쳐야 다음 스테이지로 넘어갈 수 있습니다. 

이동
엄폐 지점 사이를 이동하려면 화면에 나타나는 PlayStation® 컨트롤러 버튼을 눌러야 합니다. 현재 화면에 보이지 않는 엄폐 지점은 화살표를 통해 방향이 표시됩니다. 
왼쪽 스틱을 사용하여 은폐 지점 내에서 움직이십시오.

Objective
Fight through 3 waves of enemies while collecting weapon and treasure pick-ups. At the end of each wave, a boss character must be defeated in order to move onto the next wave.

Movement
To move between cover points, press the PlayStation®3 wireless controller button that is indicated on-screen. Cover points that are not in your field of view have an arrow pointing towards their location.
Use [LEFTSTICK] to move around while on a cover point.

目的
對三關的敵人對決，同時收集武器和寶物。在每一關的最後部份，你必須擊敗頭目才可過關。

操作
往來各個掩護點，請按螢幕顯示的PlayStation®控制器按鈕。視野範圍以外的掩護點將以箭號標示其位置。
身處一個掩護點時，可使用左操作桿[LEFTSTICK]移動。

目的
對三關的敵人對決，同時收集武器和寶物。在每一關的最後部份，你必須擊敗頭目才可過關。

操作
往來各個掩護點，請按螢幕顯示的PlayStation®控制器按鈕。視野範圍以外的掩護點將以箭號標示其位置。
身處一個掩護點時，可使用左操作桿[LEFTSTICK]移動。

Objective
Fight through 3 waves of enemies while collecting weapon and treasure pick-ups. At the end of each wave, a boss character must be defeated in order to move onto the next wave.

Movement
To move between cover points, press the PlayStation®3 wireless controller button that is indicated on-screen. Cover points that are not in your field of view have an arrow pointing towards their location.
Use [LEFTSTICK] to move around while on a cover point.

Weapons
Hold down the [L1] button to enter firing mode. While continuing to hold [L1], aim using [RIGHTSTICK]. Press [R1] to fire your weapon.

Pressing the [LEFT] or [RIGHT] directional buttons will scroll through your different available weapons.

To throw a grenade, hold down the [L2] button to display the grenade’s trajectory. While still holding [L2], use [RIGHTSTICK] to aim the grenade then release the [L2] button to throw the grenade.

Armes
Maintenez la touche [L1] enfoncée pour passer en mode de tir. Tout en continuant de maintenir [L1], visez en utilisant [RIGHTSTICK]. Appuyez sur [R1] pour tirer.

Appuyez sur les touches directionnelles [LEFT] et [RIGHT] pour faire défiler les différentes armes disponibles.

Pour lancer une grenade, maintenez la touche [L2] afin d'afficher la trajectoire de la grenade. Tout en continuant de maintenir [L2], utilisez [RIGHTSTICK] pour viser, puis relâchez la touche [L2] pour lancer la grenade.

Waffen
Halte [L1] gedrückt, um in den Feuermodus zu gelangen. Ziele mit [RIGHTSTICK], während du [L1] gedrückt hältst. Drücke [R1] um deine Waffe abzufeuern.

Drücke [LEFT] oder [RIGHT], um zwischen den verfügbaren Waffen zu wechseln.

Um eine Granate zu werfen, hältst du [L2] gedrückt, um die Flugbahn der Granate anzeigen zu lassen. Ziele mit [RIGHTSTICK], während du [L2] gedrückt hältst, und lasse dann [L2] los, um die Granate zu werfen.

Armi
Tieni premuto il tasto [L1] per entrare in modalità di puntamento. Senza rilasciare [L1], mira usando [RIGHTSTICK]. Spara premendo il tasto [R1].

Premendo i tasti direzionali [LEFT] o [RIGHT] scorrerai tra le diverse armi a tua disposizione.

Se vuoi scagliare una granata, tieni premuto il tasto [L2] per visualizzare la traiettoria di lancio. Senza rilasciare [L2], usa [RIGHTSTICK] per indirizzare la granata, quindi rilascia il tasto [L2] per lanciarla.

Armas
Mantén pulsado el botón [L1] para acceder al modo Disparo. Sin soltar el botón [L1], apunta con [RIGHTSTICK]. Pulsa el botón [R1] para disparar el arma.

Si pulsas los botones [LEFT] o [RIGHT] recorrerás todas las armas disponibles.

Para lanzar una granada, mantén pulsado el botón [L2] para mostrar su trayectoria. Con [L2] aún pulsado, usa [RIGHTSTICK] para apuntar con la granada y suelta el botón para lanzarla.

무기
[L1] 버튼을 길게 눌러 사격 자세를 취하십시오. [L1] 버튼을 누른 상태에서 오른쪽 스틱으로 조준하십시오. [R1] 버튼을 눌러 발사하십시오.

방향키 왼쪽 또는 오른쪽 버튼을 누르면 자신이 가지고 있는 무기를 변경할 수 있습니다. 

수류탄을 던지기 위해서는 [L2] 버튼을 길게 눌러 탄도를 표시하십시오. [L2] 버튼을 누른 상태에서 오른쪽 스틱으로 투척 방향을 결정한 후, [L2] 버튼을 떼어 던지십시오.

Weapons
Hold down the [L1] button to enter firing mode. While continuing to hold [L1], aim using [RIGHTSTICK]. Press [R1] to fire your weapon.

Pressing the [LEFT] or [RIGHT] directional buttons will scroll through your different available weapons.

To throw a grenade, hold down the [L2] button to display the grenade’s trajectory. While still holding [L2], use [RIGHTSTICK] to aim the grenade then release the [L2] button to throw the grenade.

武器
按住[L1]按鈕，以進入開火模式。如需瞄準，可繼續按住[L1]按鈕，並使用右操作桿[RIGHTSTICK]進行操作。按[R1]按鈕使用武器。

按左或右方向按鈕，以便查看可供使用的不同武器。

如需拋擲手榴彈，按住[L2]按鈕以顯示手榴彈的拋擲弧線。繼續按住[L2]按鈕時，使用右操作桿[RIGHTSTICK]瞄準手榴彈目標，然後放開[L2]按鈕，以便拋出手榴彈。

武器
按住[L1]按鈕，以進入開火模式。如需瞄準，可繼續按住[L1]按鈕，並使用右操作桿[RIGHTSTICK]進行操作。按[R1]按鈕使用武器。

按左或右方向按鈕，以便查看可供使用的不同武器。

如需拋擲手榴彈，按住[L2]按鈕以顯示手榴彈的拋擲弧線。繼續按住[L2]按鈕時，使用右操作桿[RIGHTSTICK]瞄準手榴彈目標，然後放開[L2]按鈕，以便拋出手榴彈。

Weapons
Hold down the [L1] button to enter firing mode. While continuing to hold [L1], aim using [RIGHTSTICK]. Press [R1] to fire your weapon.

Pressing the [LEFT] or [RIGHT] directional buttons will scroll through your different available weapons.

To throw a grenade, hold down the [L2] button to display the grenade’s trajectory. While still holding [L2], use [RIGHTSTICK] to aim the grenade then release the [L2] button to throw the grenade.

Environment Hazards\nAs well as enemies, you must also fight the environment! Quickly press the button shown on screen to avoid environment hazards. If you don’t press in time or press the wrong button, you are doomed!

Dangers de l'environnement\nEn plus des ennemis, vous devez également vous méfier de l'environnement ! Appuyez rapidement sur les touches indiquées à l'écran pour éviter les dangers de l'environnement. Si vous n'appuyez pas à temps, ou que vous appuyez sur la mauvaise touche, c'est fini pour vous !

Gefahren in der Umgebung\nNeben den Gegnern musst du auch gegen die Umgebung ankämpfen! Drücke schnell die auf dem Bildschirm angezeigte Controller-Taste, um Gefahren aus der Umgebung auszuweichen. Wenn du nicht rechtzeitig oder die falsche Taste drückst, bist du verloren!

Pericoli dell'ambiente
Oltre ai nemici, dovrai combattere l'ambiente circostante! Premi rapidamente il tasto del controller wireless indicato su schermo per evitare i pericoli ambientali. Cerca di premere il tasto corretto con il giusto tempismo, altrimenti sarai spacciato!

Tesori
Ciascuna ondata nasconde un set di sei tesori che dovrai scoprire. Sposta il personaggio sul tesoro per raccoglierlo.

Amenazas del entorno
¡Además de los enemigos, también deberás luchar contra el entorno! Pulsa rápidamente el botón que se muestre en la pantalla para evitar las amenazas del entorno. ¡Si no lo pulsas en el momento adecuado o si pulsas el botón equivocado, se acabó!

Tesoros
Cada oleada tiene seis tesoros ocultos para que los encuentres. Mueve al personaje sobre un tesoro para recogerlo.
위험 요소\n주위 환경은 적 이상으로 위험할 수 있습니다! 화면에 표시되는 PlayStation® 컨트롤러 버튼을 재빨리 눌러 위험을 피하십시오. 시간에 맞춰 올바른 버튼을 눌러야만 합니다!

Environment Hazards\nAs well as enemies, you must also fight the environment! Quickly press the button shown on screen to avoid environment hazards. If you don’t press in time or press the wrong button, you are doomed!
環境災害\n跟敵人一樣，你亦必須面對環境挑戰！迅速按下螢幕上顯示的PlayStation®控制器按鈕，避過各種環境災害。如果未能及時按鈕或按錯，死神隨即降臨！
環境災害\n跟敵人一樣，你亦必須面對環境挑戰！迅速按下螢幕上顯示的PlayStation®控制器按鈕，避過各種環境災害。如果未能及時按鈕或按錯，死神隨即降臨！

Environment Hazards\nAs well as enemies, you must also fight the environment! Quickly press the button shown on screen to avoid environment hazards. If you don’t press in time or press the wrong button, you are doomed!
Treasure\nEach wave has a set of 6 hidden treasures for you to discover. Simply move your character over the treasure to pick them up.
Trésor\nVous avez 6 trésors cachés à découvrir dans chaque vague. Pour ramasser un trésor, déplacez simplement votre personnage dessus.
Schatz\nBei jeder Angriffswelle sind sechs Schätze versteckt, die du finden musst. Bewege deinen Charakter einfach über den Schatz, um ihn aufzunehmen.
Tesori\nCiascuna ondata nasconde un set di sei tesori che dovrai scoprire. Sposta il personaggio sul tesoro per raccoglierlo.
Tesoros\nCada oleada tiene seis tesoros ocultos para que los encuentres. Mueve al personaje sobre un tesoro para recogerlo.
보물\n각 웨이브에는 여섯 개의 보물이 숨겨져 있습니다. 자신의 캐릭터를 보물 위로 이동하여 수집하십시오.
Treasure\nEach wave has a set of 6 hidden treasures for you to discover. Simply move your character over the treasure to pick them up.
寶物\n每一關收藏了六件寶物，讓你逐一發掘。只須把人物角色移至寶物便可獲得。
寶物\n每一關收藏了六件寶物，讓你逐一發掘。只須把人物角色移至寶物便可獲得。
Treasure\nEach wave has a set of 6 hidden treasures for you to discover. Simply move your character over the treasure to pick them up.

Terminez vague 1 pour débloquer cette vague.

Glückwunsch! Du hast alle Herausforderungen absolviert und einen Gutschein-Code für den exklusiv bei PlayStation®Home erhältlichen Rückstoß-Ausdauer-Booster für die Verkaufsversion von UNCHARTED 3: Drake's Deception™ erhalten!\n\n

Congratulazioni, hai completato tutte le sfide e ottenuto un codice voucher per sbloccare il potenziamento Durata Riscossa, un'esclusiva di PlayStation®Home nella versione completa di UNCHARTED 3: L'inganno di Drake™!\n\n

Enhorabuena: ¡has completado todos los desafíos y desbloqueado un vale de descarga para el potenciador de tiempo de respuesta, exclusivo de PlayStation®Home, para el juego UNCHARTED 3: La traición de Drake™!
축하합니다! 모든 도전 과제를 완료하여 UNCHARTED™3 제품판 게임에서 사용할 수 있는 PlayStation®Home 독점 킥백 지구력 부스터를 획득하였습니다!\n\n

恭喜你！你已完成所有挑戰，並獲得了可以獲得PlayStation®Home限定的「UNCHARTED™3」追加內容「回報持久助力器」之兌換代碼！\n\n

Congratulations, you have completed all challenges and unlocked a voucher code for the PlayStation®Home exclusive Kickback Endurance Booster in the UNCHARTED 3: Drake's Deception™ retail game!\n\n

1. Under "PlayStation®Network" on the XMB™, select "Account Management"

2. In the next menu, select "Redeem Codes"

3. Three input boxes will appear. Enter the following voucher code (Note: voucher code input is not case sensitive):

%s

4. Once entered, select "Continue".

5. You will be presented with the content assigned to your voucher code! Simply download it and install.

If you haven’t already, be sure to order UNCHARTED 3: Drake's Deception™ from a retailer near you.

1. Sélectionnez "Gestion du Compte" à partir du menu "PlayStation®Network" du menu XMB™

2. Dans le menu suivant, sélectionnez "Utiliser codes"

3. Trois cases apparaissent. Entrez le code suivant (Remarque : le code est insensible à la casse) :

%s

4. Une fois le code entré, sélectionnez "Continuer".

5. Vous avez à présent un aperçu du contenu correspondant à votre code ! Il ne vous reste plus qu'à le télécharger et à l'installer.

Si ce n'est pas déjà fait, pensez à commander UNCHARTED 3: l'Illusion De Drake™ dans votre magasin préféré.

1. Wähle im XMB™-Menü "PlayStation®Network" und dann "Konto-Verwaltung".

2. Wähle im nächsten Menü "Codes einlösen".

3. Es erscheinen drei Fenster. Gib den folgenden Gutschein-Code ein (Hinweis: Groß-/Kleinschreibung spielt beim Gutschein-Code keine Rolle):

%s

4. Wähle nach der Eingabe "Fortfahren".

5. Die mit dem Gutschein-Code verbundenen Inhalte werden dir angezeigt! Lade sie einfach herunter und installiere sie.

Sofern noch nicht getan, solltest du dir UNCHARTED 3: Drake's Deception™ bei einem Händler in deiner Nähe bestellen.

1. Nella sezione "PlayStation®Network" del menu XMB™ (XrossMediaBar), seleziona "Gestione account".

2. Nel menu successivo, seleziona "Riscatta codici".

3. Compariranno tre caselle di testo. Inserisci il seguente codice voucher (nota: la procedura di inserimento del codice voucher non distingue caratteri maiuscoli e minuscoli):

%s.

4. Dopo averlo inserito, seleziona "Continua".

5. Ti sarà mostrato il contenuto associato al tuo codice voucher! Scaricalo e installalo.

Se ancora non l'hai fatto, assicurati di prenotare UNCHARTED 3: L'inganno di Drake™ presso il più vicino rivenditore.

1. En la sección "PlayStation®Network" del menú XMB™ (XrossMediaBar), selecciona "Gestión de cuentas"

2. En el siguiente menú, selecciona "Canjear códigos"

3. Aparecerán tres cajas para introducir texto. Introduce el siguiente vale de descarga (nota: no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas):

%s

4. Una vez introducido, selecciona "Continuar".

5. Se mostrará el contenido asignado al vale de descarga. Descárgalo e instálalo.

Si aún no lo has hecho, encarga UNCHARTED 3: La traición de Drake™ en tu tienda habitual.

1. XMB™의 "PlayStation®Network" 항목에서 "계정 관리"를 선택하십시오.

2. 다음 메뉴에서 "코드 입력"을 선택하십시오.

3. 세 개의 입력 공간이 표시됩니다. 다음의 바우처 코드를 입력하십시오 (참조: 대소문자의 구분은 없습니다):

%s

4. 입력 후에는 "계속"을 선택하십시오.

5. 바우처 코드와 관련된 콘텐츠를 이용할 수 있습니다! 다운로드하여 설치하십시오.

아직 제품판 게임을 구매하지 않았다면 UNCHARTED™3를 마련하세요!

Your pistol has unlimited ammo but is weak. Try finding other weapons.
Votre pistolet dispose de munitions illimitées, mais il n'est pas puissant. Essayez de trouver d'autres armes.
Deine Pistole hat unbegrenzte Munition, ist aber schwach. Versuche, andere Waffen zu finden.
